        <legend>Textarea Disabled <abbr title="Required">*</abbr></legend>

				<textarea class="text-input" rows="8" cols="32" required disabled></textarea>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </fieldset>
</form>

            <option>Other</option>
        </select>

</ul>

form-signup 
<form>
	<fieldset>
		<legend>Signup</legend>
	    <ul class="form-fields">
	        <li class="block-field">
				<label for="email">Your Email Address:</label>
	        	<input id="email" class="text-input" type="email" placeholder="Where place people send your electronic mail?" />
	        	<small class="additional">Note about this field</small>
	        </li>
	        <li class="block-field">
				<label for="name">Your Name:</label>
	        	<input id="name" class="text-input" type="text" placeholder="What do people call you?" />
	        </li>
	        <li class="block-field">
	        	<select class="form-control">
	        	  <option>1</option>
	        	  <option>2</option>
	        	  <option>3</option>
	        	  <option>4</option>
	        	  <option>5</option>
	        	</select>
	        </li>
	    </ul>
	</fieldset>
</form>

form-options-radios-captions 
<form >
    <fieldset>
        <legend>Radio Buttons with Captions <abbr title="Required">*</abbr></legend>
        <ul class="check-list">
            <li>
                <label for="radio1"><input id="radio1" name="radio" type="radio" checked/> Choice A</label>
                <small class="additional">Note about this option</small>
            </li>
            <li>
                <label for="radio2"><input id="radio2" name="radio" type="radio"/> Choice B</label>
                <small class="additional">Note about this option</small>
            </li>
            <li>
                <label for="radio3"><input id="radio3" name="radio" type="radio"/> Choice C</label>
                <small class="additional">Note about this option</small>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </fieldset>
</form>

		<legend>Legend</legend>

	</fieldset>
</form>

</ul>

  • Eggs

</ul>

  • Microsoft
  • Linux
lists-ordered 
<ol>
  <li>Add listed ingredients to large mixing bowl</li>
  <li>Stir for two minutes or until no longer lumpy</li>
  <li>Pour mixture into a baking pan</li>
</ol>
  1. Add listed ingredients to large mixing bowl
  2. Stir for two minutes or until no longer lumpy
  3. Pour mixture into a baking pan

    Text

    p 
    <p>This is a paragraph of text. Some of the text may be <em>emphasised</em> and some it might even be <strong>strongly emphasised</strong>. Occasionally <q>quoted text</q> may be found within a paragraph &hellip;and of course <a href="#">a link</a> may appear at any point in the text. The average paragraph contains five or six sentences although some may contain as little or one or two while others carry on for anything up to ten sentences and beyond.</p>

    This is a paragraph of text. Some of the text may be emphasised and some it might even be strongly emphasised. Occasionally quoted text may be found within a paragraph …and of course a link may appear at any point in the text. The average paragraph contains five or six sentences although some may contain as little or one or two while others carry on for anything up to ten sentences and beyond.
